lists.per_user_and_music: function(head, req) {     var row;    var response = [];    var musicId = req.query.musicId;    var username = userCtx.name;    start({'headers': { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } });    while(row = getRow()) {      var doc = row.value;     if(doc.user==username && doc.musicId==musicId)      response.push(doc);    }    send(toJSON(response));  }
